name: connect-four-reboot-monorepo
description: Mono repo for playing the game Connect Four as CLI or SPA.

scripts.build: npm run build-cli && npm run build-spa && npm run build-api
scripts.clear: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clear --workspace connect-four-reboot-spa && npm run clear --workspace connect-four-reboot-cli && npm run clear --workspace connect-four-reboot-api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace connect-four-reboot-spa && npm run type-check --workspace connect-four-reboot-cli && npm run type-check --workspace connect-four-reboot-api

author: Marmelab
